name: The Sagrada Familia + Park Guell
description:
This tour is very special since we will visit two buildings considered Heritage of Humanity by the UNESCO.
A walk where we will be amazed with two very special buildings.
Afterwards we will go by public transportation or taxi to Park Guell , another wonder that Gaudí built for his friend and patron Eusebio Güell.
Park Guell.A fantastic world awaits us: an explosion of shapes, of colours, surprising houses stepping out of a storybook… even a Greek temple!
We will also see the most impressive terrace of all Barcelona, with some surprising views of the entire city.
The Sagrada Familia. Strolling through its interior is an unforgettable experience.
We will walk among giant trees, we will see the colours of an autumn forest; we will speak of Guadí and discover this very special man.
We will then leave the Sagrada Familia and head towards another wonder.
